title: ssh error
description:
Hi,
I implemented the ci/cd Jenkins pipeline by using your screenshots.
everything is fine but at the time of image deploying in EC2 I am getting ssh-add error

[ssh-agent] Using credentials ec2-user (awscred)
[ssh-agent] Looking for ssh-agent implementation...
[ssh-agent]   Exec ssh-agent (binary ssh-agent on a remote machine)
$ ssh-agent
SSH_AUTH_SOCK=/tmp/ssh-XXXXXXDvvPdh/agent.11108
SSH_AGENT_PID=11110
Running ssh-add (command line suppressed)
Error loading key "/var/lib/jenkins/workspace/JavaPipeline@tmp/private_key_12406232527949916936.key": error in libcrypto
[Pipeline] // sshagent
[Pipeline] }
[Pipeline] // script
[Pipeline] }
[Pipeline] // stage
[Pipeline] }
[Pipeline] // withEnv
[Pipeline] }
[Pipeline] // withCredentials
[Pipeline] }
[Pipeline] // withEnv
[Pipeline] }
[Pipeline] // node
[Pipeline] End of Pipeline
ERROR: Failed to run ssh-add
Finished: FAILURE 
please give an idea of how to resolve this.

Thanks & Regards,
Rajinikanth.
